data.name: Crow's Cry
data.detailed_description:
Crow’s Cry is a fully physically simulated world where you can interact with everything that a 6-year-old could! Items can be used in same way as their real-life equivalent allowing for some of the most immersive gameplay!



Stealth and ingenuity are key pieces to Crow’s Cry. You must use the environment around you to survive and escape being caught.



Find secrets, solve puzzles, and collect clues and try to piece the mystery surrounding the world of Crow’s Cry!



Danger lurks around every corner, and you must expect the unexpected. The tense atmosphere is sure to make anyone’s palms sweat!


Not every game on steam is going to be the right fit for you. I want to make it as easy as possible for you to know if you will enjoy Crow’s Cry. So, if you enjoy at least 5 of the points below than you will most likely enjoy my game.

Game Includes:

  • Survival/psychological horror
  • Solving challenging & satisfying puzzles
  • Clue hunting and exploring
  • Non-Linear storytelling
  • Physics simulations
  • Shorter but denser experience
  • Stealth
  • Outsmarting monsters
  • Retro inspired graphics
  • Bad Bird Puns

data.short_description: A puzzle horror game where you can grab ANY object to solve puzzles! Explore and find secrets to expose the truth. Hide from, run from, & outsmart monsters that stands in your way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Additional Notes: If it has graphics card of any kind you should be able to run it
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3700X 8-Core Processor
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1070
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is the specs of the computer that was used to make the game.
